name: Potential Webshell Creation On Static Website
description: Detects the creation of files with certain extensions on a static web site. This can be indicative of potential uploads of a web shell.
author: Beyu Denis, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, Thurein Oo
references: PT ESC rule and personal experience

detection.condition: (all of selection_wwwroot_* or all of selection_htdocs_*) and not 1 of filter_main_*

falsepositives: Legitimate administrator or developer creating legitimate executable files in a web application folder
